long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension blocks the top and bottom areas of the webpage view allowing a smaller viewing window to help when reading text on the web. 

Commands:
  - Using CTRL + SHIFT + A (will start the extension)
  - Using CTRL + SHIFT + X (will close the extension) 
  - Using CTRL + SHIFT + ⬆️ OR ⬇️ (will increase or decrease the shader size)
